e80a4225862848da89b182181bd99db9.description: Filtering the Order Action events by type.

_ORDER_ACTION_TYPE.description: The type of the order action

d0caeb9705ec4103b8b52b788d89ff19.description: Filter rule to trigger notifications when a running Trial Balance job duration goes above threshold on Trial Balance Runs System Health Dashboard.

_Interval.description: The frequency of the check in minutes. (1 ~ 1440)

_Threshold.description: The value in minutes above which notifications should be sent out. (0 ~ 10080)

_MuteActive.description: Indicates whether the mute notification is enabled.

_MuteLimit.description: The number of times this notification will trigger before it is muted. (1 ~ 100)

_MuteHour.description: The duration (in hours) for which this notification will be muted. (1 ~ 100)

ae9e731bb6a64bd4bb6e9696e1e6918d.description: Filter rule to test if # of Tax Vendor errors exceeds the threshold in System Health Tax Integration Dashboard
ae9e731bb6a64bd4bb6e9696e1e6918d.condition: TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.Window <= _Window && ((TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == _ThresholdType && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == 'Number' && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.NumberOfErrors >= _Threshold) or (TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == _ThresholdType && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == 'Percentage' && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.NumberOfErrors >= _Threshold * 0.01 * TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.Total))

_Interval.description: The frequency of the check in minutes. (1 ~ 1440)

_Window.description: The rolling window of time the data should be checked for. (in minutes, 3 ~ 1440)

_Threshold.description: The value above which notifications should be sent out. (If ThresholdType is Number, value will be number of vendor failures. If ThresholdType is Percentage, value will be percentage of total. [0, 100])

_MuteActive.description: Indicates whether the mute notification is enabled.

_MuteLimit.description: The number of times this notification will trigger before it is muted. (1 ~ 100)

_MuteHour.description: The duration (in hours) for which this notification will be muted. (1 ~ 100)

818fcbe005de48f1b3094604cccf58ad.description: Filter rule to test if # of API errors exceeds the threshold in System Health API Dashboard
818fcbe005de48f1b3094604cccf58ad.condition: TelemetryAPIFailures.Window <= Window && TelemetryAPIFailures.EndpointOperator == _EndpointOperator && TelemetryAPIFailures.Endpoint == Endpoint && TelemetryAPIFailures.ResponseCodeOperator == _ResponseCodeOperator && TelemetryAPIFailures.ResponseCode == _ResponseCode && ((TelemetryAPIFailures.ThresholdType == ThresholdType && TelemetryAPIFailures.ThresholdType == 'Number' && TelemetryAPIFailures.NumberOfAPIErrors >= Threshold) or (TelemetryAPIFailures.ThresholdType == ThresholdType && TelemetryAPIFailures.ThresholdType == 'Percentage' && TelemetryAPIFailures.NumberOfAPIErrors >= Threshold * 0.01 * TelemetryAPIFailures.Total))

Interval.description: The frequency of the check in minutes. (1 ~ 1440)

Threshold.description: The value above which notifications should be sent out. (If ThresholdType is Number, value will be number of failed requests. If ThresholdType is Percentage, value will be request failure percentage [0, 100])

Window.description: The rolling window of time the data should be checked for. (in minutes, 3 ~ 1440)

Endpoint.description: Dropdown menu with all API endpoints.

_ResponseCodeOperator.description: Dropdown menu with Response code operator.

_ResponseCode.description: Dropdown menu with all API response code.

_MuteActive.description: Indicates whether the mute notification is enabled.

_MuteLimit.description: The number of times this notification will trigger before it is muted. (1 ~ 100)

_MuteHour.description: The duration (in hours) for which this notification will be muted. (1 ~ 100)

ca2155248a2c4945b20d274779c6435c.description: Filter rule to trigger notifications when a running Payment Run duration goes above threshold.

0d7226a1d5c84511ad8d93d6b1cc9652.description: Filter rule to test if # of Payments errors exceeds the threshold in System Health Payments Dashboard
0d7226a1d5c84511ad8d93d6b1cc9652.condition: TelemetryPaymentsFailures.Window <= _Window && TelemetryPaymentsFailures.PaymentMethodType == _PaymentMethodType && TelemetryPaymentsFailures.SourceTypeOperator == _SourceTypeOperator && TelemetryPaymentsFailures.SourceType == _SourceType && ((TelemetryPaymentsFailures.ThresholdType == _ThresholdType && TelemetryPaymentsFailures.ThresholdType == 'Number' && TelemetryPaymentsFailures.NumberOfErrors >= _Threshold) or (TelemetryPaymentsFailures.ThresholdType == _ThresholdType && TelemetryPaymentsFailures.ThresholdType == 'Percentage' && TelemetryPaymentsFailures.NumberOfErrors >= _Threshold * 0.01 * TelemetryPaymentsFailures.Total))

_Interval.description: The frequency of the check in minutes. (1 ~ 1440)

_Window.description: The rolling window of time the data should be checked for. (in minutes, 3 ~ 1440)

_Threshold.description: The value above which notifications should be sent out. (If ThresholdType is Number, value will be number of requests. If ThresholdType is Percentage, value will be percentage of total payments [0, 100])

_SourceTypeOperator.description: Dropdown menu with source type operator.

56e24e00cf494ab4925c011e1eea6ca8.description: Filter rule to test if API performance goes above threshold in System Health API Dashboard
56e24e00cf494ab4925c011e1eea6ca8.condition: TelemetryAPIPerformance.Window <= Window && TelemetryAPIPerformance.Endpoint == Endpoint && TelemetryAPIPerformance.EndpointOperator == _EndpointOperator && ((TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == ThresholdPercentile && TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == 'Mean' && TelemetryAPIPerformance.MeanLatency >= Threshold) or (TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == ThresholdPercentile && TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == 'P50' && TelemetryAPIPerformance.P50Latency >= Threshold) or (TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == ThresholdPercentile && TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == 'P90' && TelemetryAPIPerformance.P90Latency >= Threshold) or (TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == ThresholdPercentile && TelemetryAPIPerformance.ThresholdPercentile == 'P95' && TelemetryAPIPerformance.P95Latency >= Threshold))

Interval.description: The frequency of the check in minutes. (1 ~ 1440)
